Author: jennifercheque
Text: thank u for this reply, this was really helpful to hear. i’m going to set up an appointment :)

Author: tofupanic
Text: I mentioned my eating disorder when I was being diagnosed with adhd and they were still willing to prescribe me stimulants (after non-stimulants didn’t work) but ymmv.  even if you feel you have to just pick one issue to talk about until you trust that the provider will take both issues seriously, talking to a professional can be super helpful. I found getting an adhd diagnosis to be really validating and valuable for that alone. plus, the provider you talk to may be able to help with adhd symptoms without medication if you talk about both and they won’t prescribe.  I absolutely empathize w that feeling of brain and body not working how they should and it’s v rough. I hope you’re able to access some help!
